00041 TableScanner::TableScanner(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, Comm *comm, TableIdentifier *table_identifier, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr, RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator_ptr, ScanSpec &scan_spec, int timeout) : m_comm(comm), m_schema_ptr(schema_ptr), m_range_locator_ptr(range_locator_ptr), m_range_server(comm, HYPERTABLE_CLIENT_TIMEOUT), m_table_identifier(table_identifier), m_started(false), m_eos(false), m_readahead(true), m_fetch_outstanding(false), m_rows_seen(0), m_timeout(timeout) {
00042   char *str;
00043 
00044   if (m_timeout == 0 ||
00045       (m_timeout = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Client.Timeout", 0)) == 0 ||
00046       (m_timeout = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Request.Timeout", 0)) == 0)
00047     m_timeout = HYPERTABLE_CLIENT_TIMEOUT;
00048 
00049   m_range_locator_ptr->get_location_cache(m_cache_ptr);
00050 
00051   m_range_server.set_default_timeout(m_timeout);
00052 
00053   m_scan_spec.row_limit = scan_spec.row_limit;
00054   m_scan_spec.max_versions = scan_spec.max_versions;
00055 
00056   // deep copy columns vector
00057   for (size_t i=0; i<scan_spec.columns.size(); i++) {
00058     str = new char [ strlen(scan_spec.columns[i]) + 1 ];
00059     strcpy(str, scan_spec.columns[i]);
00060     m_scan_spec.columns.push_back(str);
00061   }
00062 
00063   // deep copy start row
00064   if (scan_spec.start_row) {
00065     str = new char [ strlen(scan_spec.start_row) + 1 ];
00066     strcpy(str, scan_spec.start_row);
00067     m_scan_spec.start_row = str;
00068   }
00069   else
00070     m_scan_spec.start_row = 0;
00071   m_scan_spec.start_row_inclusive = scan_spec.start_row_inclusive;
00072 
00073   // deep copy end row
00074   if (scan_spec.end_row) {
00075     str = new char [ strlen(scan_spec.end_row) + 1 ];
00076     strcpy(str, scan_spec.end_row);
00077     m_scan_spec.end_row = str;
00078   }
00079   else
00080     m_scan_spec.end_row = 0;
00081   m_scan_spec.end_row_inclusive = scan_spec.end_row_inclusive;
00082 
00083   if (m_scan_spec.row_limit == 1 ||
00084       ((m_scan_spec.start_row && m_scan_spec.end_row) && !strcmp(m_scan_spec.start_row, m_scan_spec.end_row)))
00085     m_readahead = false;
00086 
00087   memcpy(&m_scan_spec.interval, &scan_spec.interval, sizeof(m_scan_spec.interval));
00088 
00089   m_scan_spec.return_deletes = scan_spec.return_deletes;
00090 
00091 }

00097 TableScanner::~TableScanner() {
00098   for (size_t i=0; i<m_scan_spec.columns.size(); i++)
00099     delete [] m_scan_spec.columns[i];
00100   delete [] m_scan_spec.start_row;
00101   delete [] m_scan_spec.end_row;
00102 
00103   // if there is an outstanding fetch, wait for it to come back or timeout
00104   if (m_fetch_outstanding)
00105     m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(m_event_ptr);
00106 }

00110 bool TableScanner::next(Cell &cell) {
00111   int error;
00112   ByteString key, value;
00113   Key keyComps;
00114   Timer timer(m_timeout);
00115 
00116   if (m_eos)
00117     return false;
00118 
00119   if (!m_started)
00120     find_range_and_start_scan(m_scan_spec.start_row, timer);
00121 
00122   while (!m_scanblock.more()) {
00123     if (m_scanblock.eos()) {
00124       if (!strcmp(m_range_info.end_row.c_str(), Key::END_ROW_MARKER) ||
00125           (m_scan_spec.end_row && (strcmp(m_scan_spec.end_row, m_range_info.end_row.c_str()) <= 0))) {
00126         m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00127         m_eos = true;
00128         return false;
00129       }
00130       std::string next_row = m_range_info.end_row;
00131       next_row.append(1,1);  // construct row key in next range
00132       find_range_and_start_scan(next_row.c_str(), timer);
00133     }
00134     else {
00135       if (m_fetch_outstanding) {
00136         if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(m_event_ptr)) {
00137           m_fetch_outstanding = false;
00138           HT_ERRORF("RangeServer 'fetch scanblock' error : %s", Protocol::string_format_message(m_event_ptr).c_str());
00139           throw Exception((int)Protocol::response_code(m_event_ptr));
00140         }
00141         else {
00142           error = m_scanblock.load(m_event_ptr);
00143           if (m_readahead && !m_scanblock.eos()) {
00144             m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), &m_sync_handler);
00145             m_fetch_outstanding = true;
00146           }
00147           else
00148             m_fetch_outstanding = false;
00149         }
00150       }
00151       else {
00152         timer.start();
00153         m_range_server.set_timeout((time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5));
00154         m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), m_scanblock);
00155       }
00156 
00157     }
00158   }
00159 
00160   if (m_scanblock.next(key, value)) {
00161     Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00162     if (!keyComps.load(key))
00163       throw Exception(Error::BAD_KEY);
00164 
00165     // check for end row
00166     if (m_scan_spec.end_row) {
00167       if (m_scan_spec.end_row_inclusive) {
00168         if (strcmp(keyComps.row, m_scan_spec.end_row) > 0) {
00169           m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00170           m_eos = true;
00171           return false;
00172         }
00173       }
00174       else {
00175         if (strcmp(keyComps.row, m_scan_spec.end_row) >= 0) {
00176           m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00177           m_eos = true;
00178           return false;
00179         }
00180       }
00181     }
00182     else if (!strcmp(keyComps.row, end_row_key)) {
00183       m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00184       m_eos = true;
00185       return false;
00186     }
00187 
00188     // check for row change and row limit
00189     if (strcmp(m_cur_row.c_str(), keyComps.row)) {
00190       m_rows_seen++;
00191       m_cur_row = keyComps.row;
00192       if (m_scan_spec.row_limit > 0 && m_rows_seen > m_scan_spec.row_limit) {
00193         m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00194         m_eos = true;
00195         return false;
00196       }
00197     }
00198 
00199     cell.row_key = keyComps.row;
00200     cell.column_qualifier = keyComps.column_qualifier;
00201     if ((cf = m_schema_ptr->get_column_family(keyComps.column_family_code)) == 0) {
00202       // LOG ERROR ...
00203       //throw Exception(Error::BAD_KEY);
00204       cell.column_family = 0;
00205     }
00206     else
00207       cell.column_family = cf->name.c_str();
00208     cell.timestamp = keyComps.timestamp;
00209     cell.value_len = value.decode_length((uint8_t **)&cell.value);
00210     cell.flag = keyComps.flag;
00211     return true;
00212   }
00213 
00214   HT_ERROR("No end marker found at end of table.");
00215 
00216   m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00217   m_eos = true;
00218   return false;
00219 }

00223 void TableScanner::find_range_and_start_scan(const char *row_key, Timer &timer) {
00224   RangeSpec  range;
00225   DynamicBuffer dbuf(0);
00226 
00227   timer.start();
00228 
00229   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, row_key, &m_range_info))
00230     m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, row_key, &m_range_info, timer, false);
00231 
00232   m_started = true;
00233 
00234   dbuf.ensure(m_range_info.start_row.length() + m_range_info.end_row.length() + 2);
00235   range.start_row = (const char *)dbuf.addNoCheck(m_range_info.start_row.c_str(), m_range_info.start_row.length()+1);
00236   range.end_row   = (const char *)dbuf.addNoCheck(m_range_info.end_row.c_str(), m_range_info.end_row.length()+1);
00237   if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(m_range_info.location.c_str(), m_cur_addr)) {
00238     HT_ERRORF("Invalid location found in METADATA entry range [%s..%s] - %s",
00239                  range.start_row, range.end_row, m_range_info.location.c_str());
00240     throw Exception(Error::INVALID_METADATA);
00241   }
00242 
00243   try {
00244     m_range_server.set_timeout((time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5));
00245     m_range_server.create_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_table_identifier, range, m_scan_spec, m_scanblock);
00246   }
00247   catch (Exception &e) {
00248 
00249     // try again, the hard way
00250     m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, row_key, &m_range_info, timer, true);
00251 
00252     // reset the range information
00253     dbuf.ensure(m_range_info.start_row.length() + m_range_info.end_row.length() + 2);
00254     range.start_row = (const char *)dbuf.addNoCheck(m_range_info.start_row.c_str(), m_range_info.start_row.length()+1);
00255     range.end_row   = (const char *)dbuf.addNoCheck(m_range_info.end_row.c_str(), m_range_info.end_row.length()+1);
00256     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(m_range_info.location.c_str(), m_cur_addr)) {
00257       HT_ERRORF("Invalid location found in METADATA entry range [%s..%s] - %s",
00258                    range.start_row, range.end_row, m_range_info.location.c_str());
00259       throw Exception(Error::INVALID_METADATA);
00260     }
00261 
00262     // create the scanner
00263     try {
00264       m_range_server.set_timeout((time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5));
00265       m_range_server.create_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_table_identifier, range, m_scan_spec, m_scanblock);
00266     }
00267     catch (Exception &e) {
00268       HT_ERRORF("%s", e.what());
00269       throw Exception(e.code(), std::string("Problem creating scanner on ") + m_table_identifier.name + "[" + range.start_row + ".." + range.end_row + "]");
00270     }
00271   }
00272 
00273   // maybe kick off readahead
00274   if (m_readahead && !m_scanblock.eos()) {
00275     m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), &m_sync_handler);
00276     m_fetch_outstanding = true;
00277   }
00278   else
00279     m_fetch_outstanding = false;
00280 }
